name: CitadelMall
0:
”Alexa, ask Citadel Mall what are their upcoming events”
”Alexa, ask Citadel Mall what the phone number is”
”Alexa, ask Citadel Mall what is the address”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: citadel mall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Citadel Mall’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Citadel Mall. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Citadel Mall’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Citadel Mall.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.citadelmall.ne.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
